Activity: Log in to the OA system and check emails. Review the goal list for the week and plan tasks accordingly.
Prepare materials for the brainstorming session: brainstorm user interaction features that align with the game goals.
Lead a brainstorming session with @ldes-1, @uiux-1, and @sdes-1 to define key user interaction features for the game. Note down all ideas.
Consolidate the ideas from the brainstorming session and prioritize the top user interaction features.
Draft initial wireframes for the UI elements based on the feedback from the brainstorming session.
Review wireframes with @uiux-1 for additional design feedback and adjustments.
Finalize the wireframes for the UI elements and prepare for prototype development.
Send a summary email to @ldes-1, @uiux-1, and @sdes-1 outlining the session outcomes and wireframe decisions.
